sendMessage(bytes,bytes,bytes[]).details: Endpoint for creating a new message. If the message requires further (gateway specific) processing before it can be sent to the destination chain, then a non-zero `sendId` must be returned. Otherwise, the message MUST be sent and this function must return 0. * MUST emit a {MessageSent} event. If any of the `attributes` is not supported, this function SHOULD revert with an {UnsupportedAttribute} error. Other errors SHOULD revert with errors not specified in ERC-7786.

supportsAttribute(bytes4).details: Getter to check whether an attribute is supported or not.
